zone.line: Alone the world! Man's heart & spirit!
May every one yet what thereof percieve
Yes, what there thus percieved is called,
Who dares Nature by right names to call?
The least, who what thereof knows
The foolish enough your full heart not evidence
Of the people the feeling, you the sight open
I tell you friend it is deep in the night
I had willingly now ever sat up
Roudnd so learned with you me to bespeak 470
